LIBFLIAPI FLIWriteIOPort

(flidev_t dev, long ioportset)

Write to the I/O port of a given camera.

Documentation

Write to the I/O port of a given camera. This function writes the value ioportset to the I/O port on camera dev.
Parameters:
dev - Camera to write I/O port of.
ioportset - Data to be written to the I/O port.
Returns:
Zero on success.
Non-zero on failure.
See Also:
FLIReadIOPort
FLIConfigureIOPort
